title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 10
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 10
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Marco Maciel Brazil Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Nasdaq 'big five' on track for $3 trillion market value."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
